about_the_game:
NightShift is an anime inspired stylish action drifting game with RPG elements. Buy parts, tune, and drift through a collection of mountain roads to become the new "Ice King" of Santa Vista.

Features
  • Explore a fully drivable 2.5D Open World - Explore the city of Santa Vista, learning about the history and culture of the people that live there!
  • Work your job? - Help a myriad of ridiculous customers through a variety of mini-games as you make money to spend on your car.
  • Drift through 4 playable Mountain Roads - Wind your way down (and up!) mastering each track, becoming the best driver in the city!
  • Become the Ice-King - Challenge over 15 unique drivers and earn the respect of the Santa Vista Drifting Scene.
  • Customizable Cars - Make your car your own through our custom Tuning System which allows you to modify almost everything on your car
  • Split Screen Local and Online Multiplayer - 1v1 friends and foes alike in split-screen local or online multiplayer
